resources:
MyEquilator 6-max 10-max cancel Cards selecion ok Flop Turn River Calculate Not enough players for calculation must be at least 2! ca-app-pub-7055288022092797/1072163863 Credit Speed and Accuracy Help position range hand random delete hands equity Choose speed and accuracy Description This app is for calculating the probability of winning poker, hand against hand, against range, range vs. range.
Icons made by Madebyoliver from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY 
 
 The basis for calculting is algorithm of Steve Brecher
 
 And of course my beautiful wife:)
>
Exit Donate(disable ads) Enter range Clear all HelpActivity Glossary of terms Positions of players at the table Streets of poker Probability of winning in percent, this particular hand or range against the entered cards of opponents Specific 2 player cards, for example Ace of hearts, King of spades возможные комбинации рук, которые могут быть у соперника, например все тузы, или все тузы и все короли, или вобще все комбинации и т.д. Text display of a specific entered hand or range Размер стола на 6 человек или же на 10
